issue.title: [C++] Standartize usage of *_HOME cmake script variables for 3rd party libs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Cmake script should has consistent way to process all \*_HOME env variables with location of 3rd party dependencies libraries (Snappy, Zlib, Zstd, Lz4 and others).
It seems, if \*_HOME env variable is set for some library, but the library is not found by that path, cmake build script should error out.
